turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Yahoo! Widgets.
turn.1: What is the feature that can bring all open widgets to the top of the desktop?
turn.2: Yahoo Widgets provides a feature that can quickly bring all open widgets to the top of the desktop.
turn.3: What is the procedure to do this?
turn.4: It can be activated by pressing a hotkey (set by the user).
turn.5: What else can you tell me about this feature?
turn.6: This causes all widgets to be brought to the foreground, and all other applications to be dimmed.
turn.7: Is there any other features that are similar?
turn.8: Widgets can also be set to be Konsposé-only, meaning that they will only appear when Konsposé is activated.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Initially called Konsposé (alluding to Mac OS X's Exposé), it was renamed to "Heads-Up Display" with the release of Yahoo Widget Engine.
turn.11: Is there any other features that are important?
turn.12: With the introduction of Yahoo Widget Engine 4.0, the engine has included a feature called the dock.
